question: Does your area experience unusual weather patterns that could include high winds, no or low rainfall, etc.?
Choose the answer that best descries how the foundation of the home is constructed.

answers.name: foundation-construction
answers.answer: The foundation is an open pier or pile foundation, the floor framing is not fire rated and is exposed to the outside of the house.
answers.suggestion: completely enclose foundation with fire rated material

answers.name: foundation-construction
answers.answer: The foundation is closed and continuous with open vents not protected by screens.
answers.suggestion: Enclose vents with screens with openings not exceeding 1/4 inches.

answers.name: foundation-construction
answers.suggestion: No suggestion.
answers.answer: The foundation is a closed pier or pile foundation with a 1-hour fire resistive barrier.

answers.name: foundation-construction
answers.suggestion: No suggestion.
answers.answer: Completely closed foundation or with non corrosive vents with openings not exceeding 1/4 inch mesh.
